title: SimplyAnime
description: SimplyAnime is a website that allows you to watch anime without any popups, ads, or any other bullshit. We aim to provide a simple and easy to use platform for watching anime.
stack: NodeJs, Express, Vue.js, TailwindCss, WebTorrent, Sequelize (mysql)

title: AdvinMulti
description: AdvinMulti is a sleek and efficient Discord bot developed using discord.js. This bot provides real-time stock updates and notifications to users. Stay informed about stock changes effortlessly right in your discord server.

title: ChitterEngine
description: The very first Discord Bot I ever made, ChitterEngine is a simple and efficient Discord bot developed using discord.js. It features a variety of commands including moderation, fun, and more.

title: Pterodactyl Dark Transparency
description: PDT is a beautiful dark transparent theme for the most popular game hosting panel Pterodactyl. It features a dark transparent design with a modern look and feel.

title: Simple Gameserver Homepage
description: A beautiful yet simple homepage for your Game Servers. It features a modern design with a server status checker, player count, and more.

title: Personal Multiuse Api
description: A personal multiuse API that I use for various projects. It includes endpoints for fetching anime data, stock data, and more.

title: Portfolio
description: The site your currently viewing. Its a portfolio to showcase some of my Projects, Skills and Information.
